name: HARD PLATFORMER (ZetingX)
description:
Welcome to HARD PLATFORMER!

I'm wanted to make really hard game... and yes, its really hard.

HARD PLATFORMER is a..... em... platformer..... hard platformer... 8-bit...

There is 15 levels and more coming soon!

Controlls:

Arrows - move

Z - jump

Z in air - double jump

Please comment if u found any bug / glitch

I recommend using the GameJolt client for automatic updates

#platformer #hard #action #retro #arcade
